14/*! \file */
15
16#include <config.h>
17
18#include <stdbool.h>
19#include <stddef.h>
20
21#include <isc/atomic.h>
22#include <isc/counter.h>
23#include <isc/magic.h>
24#include <isc/mem.h>
25#include <isc/util.h>
26
27#define COUNTER_MAGIC ISC_MAGIC('C', 'n', 't', 'r')
28#define VALID_COUNTER(r) ISC_MAGIC_VALID(r, COUNTER_MAGIC)
29
30struct isc_counter {
31 unsigned int magic;
32 isc_mem_t *mctx;
33 atomic_uint_fast32_t references;
34 atomic_uint_fast32_t limit;
35 atomic_uint_fast32_t used;
36};
37
38isc_result_t
39isc_counter_create(isc_mem_t *mctx, int limit, isc_counter_t **counterp) {
40 isc_counter_t *counter;
41
42 REQUIRE(counterp != NULL && *counterp == NULL);
43
44 counter = isc_mem_get(mctx, sizeof(*counter));
45 if (counter == NULL)
46 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
47
48 counter->mctx = NULL;
49 isc_mem_attach(mctx, &counter->mctx);
50
51 atomic_store(&counter->references, 1);
52 atomic_store(&counter->limit, limit);
53 atomic_store(&counter->used, 0);
54
55 counter->magic = COUNTER_MAGIC;
56 *counterp = counter;
57 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
58}
59
60isc_result_t
61isc_counter_increment(isc_counter_t *counter) {
62 isc_result_t result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
63
64 uint32_t used = atomic_fetch_add(&counter->used, 1) + 1;
65 if (atomic_load(&counter->limit) != 0 &&
66 used >= atomic_load(&counter->limit)) {
67 result = ISC_R_QUOTA;
68 }
69
70 return (result);
71}
72
73unsigned int
74isc_counter_used(isc_counter_t *counter) {
75 REQUIRE(VALID_COUNTER(counter));
76
77 return (atomic_load(&counter->used));
78}
79
80void
81isc_counter_setlimit(isc_counter_t *counter, int limit) {
82 REQUIRE(VALID_COUNTER(counter));
83
84 atomic_store(&counter->limit, limit);
85}
86
87void
88isc_counter_attach(isc_counter_t *source, isc_counter_t **targetp) {
89 REQUIRE(VALID_COUNTER(source));
90 REQUIRE(targetp != NULL && *targetp == NULL);
91
92 INSIST(atomic_fetch_add(&source->references, 1) > 0);
93
94 *targetp = source;
95}
96
97static void
98destroy(isc_counter_t *counter) {
99 counter->magic = 0;
100 isc_mem_putanddetach(&counter->mctx, counter, sizeof(*counter));
101}
102
103void
104isc_counter_detach(isc_counter_t **counterp) {
105 isc_counter_t *counter;
106 uint32_t oldrefs;
107
108 REQUIRE(counterp != NULL && *counterp != NULL);
109 counter = *counterp;
110 REQUIRE(VALID_COUNTER(counter));
111
112 *counterp = NULL;
113
114 oldrefs = atomic_fetch_sub(&counter->references, 1);
115 INSIST(oldrefs > 0);
116
117 if (oldrefs == 1) {
118 destroy(counter);
119 }
120}
121
